title: Currently Working On
synopsis: Here is a list of [[Recent Changes]] I consider important. View our experiments on the [[Scratch]] page. To clear stuff saved in your browser try [[Local Changes]].

title: Fedwiki Tools
synopsis: Here we list a few tools that are of particular use in managing and creating [[Fedwiki]] content.

title: HTML Table Library
synopsis: [[revIgnitor]]s [[HTML Table Library]] which you can find in a file called Table.lc in the revIgnitor distribution.

title: lib_Dropbox
synopsis: This library is for interfacing with the Dropbox REST API.

title: lib_Flickr
synopsis: [[Library Template]]

title: lib_Github
synopsis: A new library to interface with [[GitHub]]. See also [[lib_Git]].

title: lib_HtmlTable
synopsis: Here we are beginning to build a [[Script Only Stack Library]] that facilitates the creation and processing of [[HTML Table]]s.

title: lib_Mediawiki
synopsis: This library is for interfacing with the [[WikiPedia API]]. For the older stack based library check [[libOPN_MediaWiki]].

title: libOPN_MediaWiki
synopsis: This is the older stack based library is for interfacing with the [[WikiPedia API]]. Pretty much all the code is now in the script only stack library  [[lib_MediaWiki]].

title: Library Template
synopsis: This library is for....

title: lib_Slack
synopsis: This library is for interfacing with the [[Slack]] REST API.

title: Livecode Libraries
synopsis: Here we list open source [[Livecode Script Libraries]] that are available as part of [[Livecode World]]:

title: Livecode oAuth Library
synopsis: This is the OAuth2 Script Library for Livecode. It is fairly basic.

title: MediaWiki API
synopsis: The MediaWiki web API is a web service that provides convenient access to wiki features, data, and meta-data over HTTP. - [https://www.mediawiki.org/wiki/API:Main_page mediawiki.org]

title: OAuth 2.0
synopsis: OAuth 2.0 is the next evolution of the OAuth protocol and is not backwards compatible with OAuth 1.0. OAuth 2.0 focuses on client developer simplicity while providing specific authorization flows for web applications, desktop applications, mobile phones, and living room devices - [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Oauth#OAuth_2.0 wikipedia]

title: Research Group Activity

title: Welcome Visitors
synopsis: Welcome to this [[Federated Wiki]] site about [[Livecode Libraries]]. Here we write about code and programming in the [[LiveScript]] and [[Livecode Builder]] languages.
